author: tersec
content: Yes, https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/v1.5.0-alpha.4/specs/capella/beacon-chain.md already allows for withdrawals. 0x01 (`ETH1_ADDRESS_WITHDRAWAL_PREFIX`) already happened. It is not "upcoming". Withdrawals have been happening for more than a year now, since April of 2023.

author: for3ternity
content:
yeah but soon we will allow the 0x01 to exit validators.
people with compromised 0x01 will loose their eth.
my estimate is 10s or hundres of million worth in USD will be lost to hackers, and let’s be sure about one thing, they don’t deserve it
so i was considering that for a window of weeks or months a prior fork could be made that allows only people with both validator credentials and withdrawal credentials to change the withdrawal address.
i know this is not likely to happen nor easy, nor perhaps even possible,
i just wanted to air the idea, thank you
